016package io.micronaut.maven.aot;
017
018import io.micronaut.maven.services.CompilerService;
019import io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService;
020import io.micronaut.maven.services.ExecutorService;
021import org.apache.maven.plugin.MojoExecutionException;
022import org.apache.maven.plugins.annotations.Parameter;
023import org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject;
024import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.InvocationResult;
025import org.apache.maven.shared.invoker.MavenInvocationException;
026import org.codehaus.plexus.util.StringUtils;
027import org.codehaus.plexus.util.xml.Xpp3Dom;
028import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.Artifact;
029import org.eclipse.aether.artifact.DefaultArtifact;
030import org.eclipse.aether.resolution.DependencyResolutionException;
031import org.eclipse.aether.util.artifact.JavaScopes;
032import org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor;
033
034import javax.inject.Inject;
035import java.io.File;
036import java.util.ArrayList;
037import java.util.Arrays;
038import java.util.Collections;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.stream.Stream;
041
042import static io.micronaut.maven.aot.Constants.*;
043import static io.micronaut.maven.services.DependencyResolutionService.toClasspath;
044import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.configuration;
045import static org.twdata.maven.mojoexecutor.MojoExecutor.element;
046
047/**
048 * Base class for Micronaut AOT mojos.
049 */
050public abstract class AbstractMicronautAotCliMojo extends AbstractMicronautAotMojo {
051
052    public static final String EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_GROUP = "org.codehaus.mojo";
053    public static final String EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_ARTIFACT = "exec-maven-plugin";
054    public static final String EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_VERSION_PROPERTY = "exec-maven-plugin.version";
055    public static final String DEFAULT_EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_VERSION = "3.1.0";
056
057    private static final String[] AOT_MODULES = new String[]{
058            "api",
059            "cli",
060            "std-optimizers"
061    };
062
063    /**
064     * Package name to use for generated sources.
065     */
066    @Parameter(property = MICRONAUT_AOT_PACKAGE_NAME)
067    protected String packageName;
068
069    private final ExecutorService executorService;
070
071    private final DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService;
072
073    @Parameter
074    private List<org.apache.maven.model.Dependency> aotDependencies;
075
076    @Inject
077    public AbstractMicronautAotCliMojo(CompilerService compilerService, ExecutorService executorService,
078                                       MavenProject mavenProject, DependencyResolutionService dependencyResolutionService) {
079        super(compilerService, mavenProject);
080        this.executorService = executorService;
081        this.dependencyResolutionService = dependencyResolutionService;
082    }
083
084    protected abstract List<String> getExtraArgs() throws MojoExecutionException;
085
086    @Override
087    protected void doExecute() throws MojoExecutionException, DependencyResolutionException {
088        if (StringUtils.isEmpty(packageName)) {
089            throw new MojoExecutionException(MICRONAUT_AOT_PACKAGE_NAME + " is not set, and is required if AOT is enabled");
090        }
091        try {
092            getLog().info("Packaging project");
093            compilerService.compileProject(true);
094            InvocationResult packagingResult = compilerService.packageProject();
095            if (packagingResult.getExitCode() != 0) {
096                getLog().error("Error when packaging the project: ", packagingResult.getExecutionException());
097            } else {
098                executeAot();
099            }
100        } catch (MavenInvocationException e) {
101            getLog().error("Error when packaging project", e);
102        }
103    }
104
105    private void executeAot() throws DependencyResolutionException, MojoExecutionException {
106        getLog().info("Executing Micronaut AOT analysis");
107        Xpp3Dom config = createExecPluginConfig();
108
109        executorService.executeGoal(
110                EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_GROUP,
111                EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_ARTIFACT,
112                mavenProject.getProperties().getProperty(EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_VERSION_PROPERTY, DEFAULT_EXEC_MAVEN_PLUGIN_VERSION),
113                "exec",
114                config
115        );
116    }
117
118    private Xpp3Dom createExecPluginConfig() throws DependencyResolutionException, MojoExecutionException {
119        List<String> aotClasspath = resolveAotClasspath();
120        List<String> aotPluginsClasspath = resolveAotPluginsClasspath();
121        List<String> applicationClasspath = resolveApplicationClasspath();
122
123        List<String> classpath = new ArrayList<>(aotPluginsClasspath.size() + applicationClasspath.size());
124        classpath.addAll(aotClasspath);
125        classpath.addAll(aotPluginsClasspath);
126        classpath.addAll(applicationClasspath);
127        MojoExecutor.Element[] runnerArgs = Stream.concat(Stream.of(
128                        "-classpath",
129                        String.join(File.pathSeparator, aotClasspath),
130                        MICRONAUT_AOT_MAIN_CLASS,
131
132                        // CLI args
133                        "--classpath=" + String.join(File.pathSeparator, classpath),
134                        "--package=" + packageName,
135                        "--runtime=" + runtime
136                ), getExtraArgs().stream())
137                .map(arg -> element("argument", arg))
138                .toArray(MojoExecutor.Element[]::new);
139        return configuration(
140                element("executable", "java"),
141                element("arguments", runnerArgs)
142        );
143    }
144
145    private List<String> resolveApplicationClasspath() {
146        String projectJar = new File(mavenProject.getBuild().getDirectory(), mavenProject.getBuild().getFinalName() + ".jar").getAbsolutePath();
147        List<String> result = new ArrayList<>();
148        result.add(projectJar);
149        String classpath = compilerService.buildClasspath(compilerService.resolveDependencies(JavaScopes.RUNTIME));
150        result.addAll(Arrays.asList(classpath.split(File.pathSeparator)));
151        return result;
152    }
153
154    private List<String> resolveAotClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
155        Stream<Artifact> aotArtifacts = Arrays.stream(AOT_MODULES)
156                .map(m -> new DefaultArtifact(MICRONAUT_AOT_GROUP_ID + ":" + MICRONAUT_AOT_ARTIFACT_ID_PREFIX + m + ":" + micronautAotVersion));
157        return toClasspath(dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(aotArtifacts, false));
158    }
159
160    private List<String> resolveAotPluginsClasspath() throws DependencyResolutionException {
161        if (aotDependencies != null && !aotDependencies.isEmpty()) {
162            Stream<Artifact> aotPlugins = aotDependencies.stream().map(d -> new DefaultArtifact(d.getGroupId(), d.getArtifactId(), d.getType(), d.getVersion()));
163            return toClasspath(dependencyResolutionService.artifactResultsFor(aotPlugins, false));
164        } else {
165            return Collections.emptyList();
166        }
167    }
168
169}
